remarks: The existence of proper substitution into a class.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2007.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)  Use ~ csbex instead of this.  Obsolete as of 17-Aug-2018. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
